name: Yugasa Software
description:
Yugasa Bot is a conversational AI SaaS platform using which, virtual assistants, chatbots, and virtual receptions can be created for multiple use cases in both the private and public sector. The platform uses generative AI (Open AI ChatGPT, Anthropic Claude), predictive AI and the bots created using this platform can chat in more than 100 languages. 
The bots developed using Yugasa Bot platform can be deployed on various communication channels like WhatsApp, Website, Mobile app, Alexa, Google Business messages etc. Company has filed 4 patents in India. Yugasa Bot has its own suite of integrated products like ticketing software, hospital management system, smart DB, Human Agent interface etc.
